author: Fortune Editors
title: These Are the Best Companies to Work for in Texas
text:
These Are the Best Companies to Work for in Texas Courtesy of Edward Jones By Fortune Editors 7:00 AM EDT 
The Lone Star State is one of the countryâ€™s fastest-growing job markets. Here, the best small and large companies to work for in Texas, compiled from thousands of employee surveys by Fortune partner Great Place to Work. Many of the awardees are headquartered in the state (like 50 of the Fortune 500), others have a few standout offices here, and all get rave reviews from employees. 
For more on how this list was created, as well as company profiles for each awardee, visit the Great Place to Work website . 
Best Large Companies in Texas 1. Edward Jones
